entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shelburne Sandy Point 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
